member.name: XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Defines stream buffer parameters that may change from one call to the next. Used with the method.

member.name: XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS.pBuffer
member.summary: Pointer to a stream buffer that contains audio data. The buffer must be 16-byte aligned, non-NULL, and must be at least .MaxFrameCount frames in size.

member.name: XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS.BufferFlags
member.summary: An enumeration describing the contents of the stream buffer.

member.name: XAPO_PROCESS_BUFFER_PARAMETERS.ValidFrameCount
member.summary: Number of frames to process; this value must be within the range 0 to .MaxFrameCount.
